role: Researcher at People and Robots Teaching and Learning Lab
bullet points: Aiding in building a high-level task planner which assigns tasks to robots using the GPT-4 API, Python, and Prompt Engineering
Utilizing the Google Speech API to build a framework that connects with 2 robots to take in sound input and speak (built a parser to connect the framework to the task planner).

Using VLMs (Video Language Models) and Python to perceive items placed in a fridge for future learning of user preferences (how a user likes to place items in a fridge) and making decisions that align with those user preferences
Publication: MOASIC: A Modular System for Assistive and Interactive Cooking

role: Software Engineer Intern at Cisco AppDynamics
bullet points: Built an automation of FSO (Full Stack Observability) workflows using the fsoc (FSO Control Utility) tool
Utilized the BATS (BASH Automated Testing System) and shell scripting to script 30+ solution lifecycle workflows and produce a report with test results for the fsoc tool
Used by developers of fsoc to discover 5+ major bugs in the fsoc tool

Mentor over 700 Introduction to Computing students (both Computer Science and non-technical majors), explaining challenging concepts such as string manipulation to object-oriented programming, as well as help them learn how to build, test, and debug programs
Hold weekly consulting hours and bi-weekly lab time and help grade projects and exams
